# AWW | Layouts

The layout behaviour is deduced from its structure, and the flow of elements;
hence, it is bound to the layout's elements order.

## Basics

### Simple

```html
<body>
    <div>
        <header></header>
        <!--<nav></nav> **optional-->
        <main></main>
        <footer></footer>
    </div>
</body>
```

### Navbar

```html
<body>
    <div>
        <nav></nav>
        <!--<header></header> **optional-->
        <main></main>
        <footer></footer>
    </div>
</body>
```
